en.title: Leo Pledge
en.content:
I pledge of my hands
Extended and open
to help those in need
I pledge of my heart
Reach for it and it will be touched
I pledge of my ears
To hear anotherâ€™s outcry
My eyes to
see the plight of others
My knowledge to
bring a man Closer to his dreams
I pledge of myself
for the betterment of my community And my country
